description: Number of independent sets of nodes in C_4 X C_n (n > 2).
references: C. Bautista-Ramos and C. Guillen-Galvan, Fibonacci numbers of generalized Zykov sums, J. Integer Seq., 15 (2012), Article 12.7.8
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2, 15, 8, -7, -2, 1).
author: Stephen G. Penrice (spenrice(AT)ets.org), Dec 21 1999
extensions: More terms from Michael Lugo (mlugo(AT)thelabelguy.com), Dec 22 1999
